author: Virtual Reality Oasis
description:
In this video I'll give you a progress update on the Ready Or Not VRO Mod. We're getting closer to release the VR mod which will be free for all players on Steam. 

Support the Ready Or Not VRO Mod here;
https://ko-fi.com/readyornotvromod

Join the Ready Or Not VRO Mod Discord here;
https://discord.gg/7wHGztfgjM

Timestamps;
00:00 - Intro
01:56 - Mod Mechanics & Gameplay
15:38 - VRO Updates

Thanks for watching []-)
